item.title: [Python] [Python tutorial] Easy introduction to Python
item.description: #Introduction It is an attempt to read the Python Tutorial 3rd Edition and make a note of what you have learned. Python Tutorial 3rd Edition And when I finish reading, I want to take this test At the end of the test, the test has begun… Python 3 Engineer Certification Basic Exam I hope I can continue, I hope I continue Use Python as a calculator Numerical value Number type Integer has type int Numbers with fractions have type float (float) Division always returns type float >>> 2 + 2 Four >>> 50-5 * 6 20 >>> (50-5 * 6) / 4 5.
